deprecated_yaml_import_issue_error.title: The Duck DNS YAML configuration import failed
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_error.description:
Configuring Duck DNS using YAML is being removed but there was error when trying to import the YAML configuration.

Ensure the YAML configuration is correct and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the Duck DNS YAML configuration from your `configuration.yaml` file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.
